sentences.en: A bloody , demonical lust so unnatural you knew they were damned forever.
sentences.cn: 你们知道, 他们俩已经永远给打入地狱了.

sentences.en: A mother who is cruel to her child is unnatural.
sentences.cn: 母亲对孩子残忍是不近人情的.

sentences.en: An unnatural silence and desertion reigned there.
sentences.cn: 一种不自然的寂静和空旷笼罩着.

sentences.en: And their queer, crude life seemed as unnatural as that of hedgehogs.
sentences.cn: 他们的奇怪的粗鄙的生活,在他看来,仿佛象刺猖的生活一样反乎自然.

sentences.en: Did her behaviour seem unnatural in any way?
sentences.cn: 她有任何反常表现 吗 ?

sentences.en: Her voice was a little strained, a little unnatural.
sentences.cn: 她问,声音有点紧张, 有点不自然.

sentences.en: I consider activities such as jogging and weightlifting as unnatural.
sentences.cn: 我认为像慢跑、举重这样的运动不符合自然规律。

sentences.en: It is unnatural for birds to fly north in the winter.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿在冬天飞向北方是反常的.

sentences.en: It is unnatural for brothers to be at variance.
sentences.cn: 兄弟之间不睦是不近人情的.

sentences.en: It was very cold, which seemed unnatural for late spring.
sentences.cn: 天很冷，对于晚春来说似乎不正常。

sentences.en: Manned submersibles, like spaceships, must maintain living conditions in an unnatural environment.
sentences.cn: 载人的潜水器与宇宙飞船一样, 必须在非自然的环境下保持生存条件.

sentences.en: She gave him a bright, determined smile which seemed unnatural.
sentences.cn: 她对他开朗、坚定地一笑，但笑得有点不自然。

sentences.en: She has an unnatural smile on her face.
sentences.cn: 她脸上挂着做作的微笑.

sentences.en: The aircraft rose with unnatural speed on take-off.
sentences.cn: 那架飞机以反常的速度起飞升空。

sentences.en: The altered landscape looks unnatural and weird.
sentences.cn: 改造后的景观看起来很不自然，极其怪异。

sentences.en: Too much make - up looks unnatural.
sentences.cn: 上装过于浓艳看上去不自然.

words.tran_cn: 故意地；违反习俗地；不合乎自然规律地
不自然的；反常的；不近人情的

trans.tran_cn: 不自然的，做作的，奇异的，不真诚的，违背人性的，变态的
trans.tran_en: different from what you would normally expect
